tool_description: Validates incident data quality by checking for completeness, consistency, and identifying data anomalies that could affect analysis.

dataset_id.description: Identifier for the parsed incident dataset

required_fields.description: List of field names that must be present in each record

check_duplicates.description: Whether to check for duplicate incidents

error_messages: Dataset not found: Ensure the dataset_id corresponds to a valid parsed dataset.
Invalid required_fields: At least one field name must be specified in the array.
Empty dataset: The dataset contains no records to validate.
usage: Provide dataset_id and required_fields array. Set check_duplicates to false if duplicate checking is not needed. Returns validation report with quality metrics.

completeness_score.description: Percentage of records with all required fields complete

duplicate_count.description: Number of potential duplicate records found

missing_field_counts.description: Count of missing values for each field

validation_status.description: Overall validation result: passed, warnings, or failed

anomaly_flags.description: List of detected data anomalies or inconsistencies
